author: vicepool
title: ADAPlus - Pool Market
description: Delegators are looking for places to maximize their staking rewards. Pools are actively marketing to attract new delegators.
solution: A free market with offers from SPOs to attract delegators immediately.  Google Adwords vs. SEO analogy.
experience: Two co-proposers. Over 15y of experience as SW engineers, entrepreneurs, marketers. From the developers of CardanoWall and ADAPlus.
